net.kuujo.vertigo.feeder

Class DefaultPollingFeeder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.kuujo.vertigo.component.ComponentBase<T>
      • net.kuujo.vertigo.feeder.AbstractFeeder<PollingFeeder>
        • net.kuujo.vertigo.feeder.DefaultPollingFeeder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component<PollingFeeder>, Feeder<PollingFeeder>, PollingFeeder

    public class DefaultPollingFeeder
extends AbstractFeeder<PollingFeeder>
implements PollingFeeder
    A default polling feeder implementation.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

      • setFeedDelay

        public PollingFeeder setFeedDelay(long delay)
        Description copied from interface: PollingFeeder
        Sets the feed delay. The feed delay indicates the interval at which the feeder will attempt to poll the feed handler for new data.
        Specified by:
        setFeedDelay in interface PollingFeeder
        Parameters:
        delay - The empty feed delay.
        Returns:
        The called feeder instance.

      • feedHandler

        public PollingFeeder feedHandler(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<PollingFeeder> handler)
        Description copied from interface: PollingFeeder
        Sets a feed handler. The feed handler will be periodically polled for new data. Each time the feed handler is polled only a single message should be emitted. This allows the feeder to maintain control over the flow of data. If the feed handler is called but fails to feed any new messages to the network, the feeder will reschedule the next call to the handler for a period in the near future.
        Specified by:
        feedHandler in interface PollingFeeder
        Parameters:
        handler - A handler to be invoked for feeding data to the network.
        Returns:
        The called feeder instance.
